1: -module(sm_SUITE).
    2: -compile(export_all).
    3: 
    4: -include_lib("exml/include/exml.hrl").
    5: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
    6: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    7: 
    8: -define(MOD_SM, mod_stream_management).
    9: -define(CONSTRAINT_CHECK_TIMEOUT, 5000).
   10: 
   11: -import(vcard_update, [discard_vcard_update/1,
   12:                        has_mod_vcard_xupdate/0,
   13:                        server_string/1]).
   14: -import(escalus_stanza, [setattr/3]).
   15: 
   16: -define(SHORT_RESUME_TIMEOUT, 5).
   17: -define(SMALL_SM_BUFFER, 3).
   18: 
   19: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   20: %% Suite configuration
   21: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   22: 
   23: all() ->
   24:     [{group, parallel},
   25:      {group, parallel_manual_ack_freq_1},
   26:      server_requests_ack_freq_2
   27:      ].
   28: 
   29: groups() ->
   30:     [{parallel, [parallel], parallel_test_cases()},
   31:      {parallel_manual_ack_freq_1, [parallel], parallel_manual_ack_test_cases()}
   32:     ].
   33: 
   34: parallel_test_cases() ->
   35:     [server_announces_sm,
   36:      server_enables_sm_before_session,
   37:      server_enables_sm_after_session,
   38:      server_returns_failed_after_start,
   39:      server_returns_failed_after_auth,
   40:      server_enables_resumption,
   41:      basic_ack,
   42:      h_ok_before_session,
   43:      h_ok_after_session_enabled_before_session,
   44:      h_ok_after_session_enabled_after_session,
   45:      h_ok_after_a_chat,
   46:      resend_unacked_on_reconnection,
   47:      session_established,
   48:      wait_for_resumption,
   49:      resume_session
   50:      ].
   51: 
   52: parallel_manual_ack_test_cases() ->
   53:     [client_acks_more_than_sent,
   54:      too_many_unacked_stanzas,
   55:      preserve_order,
   56:      resend_unacked_after_resume_timeout,
   57:      resume_session_state_send_message,
   58:      resume_session_state_stop_c2s,
   59:      server_requests_ack_after_session,
   60:      resend_more_offline_messages_than_buffer_size,
   61:      server_requests_ack
   62:      ].
   63: 
   64: 
   65: suite() ->
   66:     escalus:suite().
   67: 
   68: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   69: %% Init & teardown
   70: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   71: 
   72: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   73:     NewConfig1 = escalus_ejabberd:setup_option(ack_freq(never), Config),
   74:     NewConfig = escalus_ejabberd:setup_option(buffer_max(?SMALL_SM_BUFFER), NewConfig1),
   75:     NewConfigWithSM = escalus_users:update_userspec(NewConfig, alice, stream_management, true),
   76:     escalus:init_per_suite(NewConfigWithSM).
   77: 
   78: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   79:     NewConfig = escalus_ejabberd:reset_option(ack_freq(never), Config),
   80:     NewConfig1 = escalus_ejabberd:reset_option(buffer_max(?SMALL_SM_BUFFER), NewConfig),
   81:     escalus_fresh:clean(),
   82:     escalus:end_per_suite(NewConfig1).
   83: 
   84: init_per_group(parallel_manual_ack_freq_1, Config) ->
   85:     true = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(?MOD_SM, set_ack_freq, [1]),
   86:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(?MOD_SM, set_resume_timeout, [?SHORT_RESUME_TIMEOUT]),
   87:     escalus_users:update_userspec(Config, alice, manual_ack, true);
   88: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   89:     Config.
   90: 
   91: 
   92: end_per_group(parallel_manual_ack, Config) ->
   93:     true = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(?MOD_SM, set_ack_freq, [never]),
   94:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(?MOD_SM, set_resume_timeout, [600]),
   95:     Config;
   96: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   97:     Config.
   98: 
   99: init_per_testcase(server_requests_ack_freq_2, Config) ->
  100:     true = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(?MOD_SM, set_ack_freq, [2]),
  101:     Config;
  102: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  103:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  104: 
  105: end_per_testcase(server_requests_ack_freq_2, Config) ->
  106:     true = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(?MOD_SM, set_ack_freq, [never]),
  107:     Config;
  108: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
  109:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
  110: 
  111: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  112: %% Tests
  113: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  114: 
  115: server_announces_sm(Config) ->
  116:     AliceSpec = given_fresh_spec(Config, alice),
  117:     {ok, _, Props, Features} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec,
  118:                                                         [start_stream]),
  119:     true = escalus_session:can_use_stream_management(Props, Features).
  120: 
  121: 
  122: server_enables_sm_before_session(Config) ->
  123:     AliceSpec = given_fresh_spec(Config, alice),
  124:     {ok, _, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec, [start_stream,
  125:                                                          stream_features,
  126:                                                          maybe_use_ssl,
  127:                                                          authenticate,
  128:                                                          bind,
  129:                                                          stream_management]).
  130: 
  131: server_enables_sm_after_session(Config) ->
  132:     AliceSpec = given_fresh_spec(Config, alice),
  133:     {ok, _, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec, [start_stream,
  134:                                                          stream_features,
  135:                                                          maybe_use_ssl,
  136:                                                          authenticate,
  137:                                                          bind,
  138:                                                          session,
  139:                                                          stream_management]).
  140: 
  141: server_returns_failed_after_start(Config) ->
  142:     server_returns_failed(Config, []).
  143: 
  144: server_returns_failed_after_auth(Config) ->
  145:     server_returns_failed(Config, [authenticate]).
  146: 
  147: server_enables_resumption(Config) ->
  148:     AliceSpec = given_fresh_spec(Config, alice),
  149:     %% Assert matches {ok, _, _, _}
  150:     {ok, Alice, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec,
  151:                                                  [start_stream,
  152:                                                   stream_features,
  153:                                                   maybe_use_ssl,
  154:                                                   authenticate,
  155:                                                   bind,
  156:                                                   session,
  157:                                                   stream_resumption]),
  158:     escalus_connection:stop(Alice).
  159: 
  160: server_returns_failed(Config, ConnActions) ->
  161:     AliceSpec = given_fresh_spec(Config, alice),
  162:     {ok, Alice, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec,
  163:                                                  [start_stream,
  164:                                                   stream_features,
  165:                                                   maybe_use_ssl]
  166:                                                  ++ ConnActions),
  167:     escalus_connection:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:enable_sm()),
  168:     escalus:assert(is_sm_failed, [<<"unexpected-request">>],
  169:                    escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, enable_sm_failed)).
  170: 
  171: 
  172: basic_ack(Config) ->
  173:     AliceSpec = given_fresh_spec(Config, alice),
  174:     {ok, Alice, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec,
  175:                                                  [start_stream,
  176:                                                   stream_features,
  177:                                                   maybe_use_ssl,
  178:                                                   authenticate,
  179:                                                   bind,
  180:                                                   session,
  181:                                                   stream_management]),
  182:     escalus_connection:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:roster_get()),
  183:     escalus:assert(is_roster_result,
  184:                    escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, roster_result)),
  185:     escalus_connection:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:sm_request()),
  186:     escalus:assert(is_sm_ack,
  187:                    escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, stream_mgmt_ack)).
  188: 
  189: %% Test that "h" value is valid when:
  190: %% - SM is enabled *before* the session is established
  191: %% - <r/> is sent *before* the session is established
  192: h_ok_before_session(Config) ->
  193:     AliceSpec = given_fresh_spec(Config, alice),
  194:     {ok, Alice, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec,
  195:                                                  [start_stream,
  196:                                                   stream_features,
  197:                                                   maybe_use_ssl,
  198:                                                   authenticate,
  199:                                                   bind,
  200:                                                   stream_management]),
  201:     escalus_connection:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:sm_request()),
  202:     escalus:assert(is_sm_ack, [0],
  203:                    escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, stream_mgmt_ack)).
  204: 
  205: %% Test that "h" value is valid when:
  206: %% - SM is enabled *before* the session is established
  207: %% - <r/> is sent *after* the session is established
  208: h_ok_after_session_enabled_before_session(Config) ->
  209:     AliceSpec = given_fresh_spec(Config, alice),
  210:     {ok, Alice, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec,
  211:                                                  [start_stream,
  212:                                                   stream_features,
  213:                                                   maybe_use_ssl,
  214:                                                   authenticate,
  215:                                                   bind,
  216:                                                   stream_management,
  217:                                                   session]),
  218:     escalus_connection:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:sm_request()),
  219:     escalus:assert(is_sm_ack, [1],
  220:                    escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, stream_mgmt_ack)).
  221: 
  222: %% Test that "h" value is valid when:
  223: %% - SM is enabled *after* the session is established
  224: %% - <r/> is sent *after* the session is established
  225: h_ok_after_session_enabled_after_session(Config) ->
  226:     AliceSpec = given_fresh_spec(Config, alice),
  227:     {ok, Alice, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec,
  228:                                                  [start_stream,
  229:                                                   stream_features,
  230:                                                   maybe_use_ssl,
  231:                                                   authenticate,
  232:                                                   bind,
  233:                                                   session,
  234:                                                   stream_management]),
  235:     escalus_connection:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:roster_get()),
  236:     escalus:assert(is_roster_result,
  237:                    escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, roster_result)),
  238:     escalus_connection:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:sm_request()),
  239:     escalus:assert(is_sm_ack, [1],
  240:                    escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, stream_mgmt_ack)).
  241: 
  242: %% Test that "h" value is valid after exchanging a few messages.
  243: h_ok_after_a_chat(ConfigIn) ->
  244:     Config = escalus_users:update_userspec(ConfigIn, alice,
  245:                                            stream_management, true),
  246:     escalus:fresh_story(Config, [{alice,1}, {bob,1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  247:         NDiscarded = discard_vcard_update(Alice),
  248:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"Hi, Bob!">>)),
  249:         escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Hi, Bob!">>],
  250:                        escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
  251:         escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hi, Alice!">>)),
  252:         escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Hi, Alice!">>],
  253:                        escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
  254:         escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"How's life?">>)),
  255:         escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"How's life?">>],
  256:                        escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
  257:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Bob, <<"Pretty !@#$%^$">>)),
  258:         escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Pretty !@#$%^$">>],
  259:                        escalus:wait_for_stanza(Bob)),
  260:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:sm_request()),
  261:         escalus:assert(is_sm_ack, [3], escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
  262:         %% Ack, so that unacked messages don't go into offline store.
  263:         escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:sm_ack(3 + NDiscarded))
  264:     end).
  265: 
  266: client_acks_more_than_sent(Config) ->
  267:     AliceSpec = given_fresh_spec(Config, alice),
  268:     {ok, Alice, _Props, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec),
  269:     escalus:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:sm_ack(5)),
  270:     escalus:assert(is_stream_error, [<<"policy-violation">>,
  271:                                      <<"h attribute too big">>],
  272:                    escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)).
  273: 
  274: too_many_unacked_stanzas(Config) ->
  275:     %escalus:story(Config, [{alice,1}, {bob,1}], fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  276:     {Bob, _} = given_fresh_user(Config, bob),
  277:     {Alice, _} = given_fresh_user(Config, alice),
  278:     escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice), %% wait for ack request
  279:     Msg = escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hi, Alice!">>),
  280:     [escalus:send(Bob, Msg) || _ <- lists:seq(1,?SMALL_SM_BUFFER)],
  281:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, ?SMALL_SM_BUFFER * 2), % messages and ack requests
  282:     escalus:assert(is_stream_error, [<<"resource-constraint">>,
  283:                                      <<"too many unacked stanzas">>],
  284:                    %% wait for deffered buffer check
  285:                    escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice, ?CONSTRAINT_CHECK_TIMEOUT + 1000)).
  286: 
  287: server_requests_ack(Config) ->
  288:     server_requests_ack(Config, 1).
  289: 
  290: server_requests_ack(Config, N) ->
  291:     {Bob, _} = given_fresh_user(Config, bob),
  292:     {Alice, _} = given_fresh_user(Config, alice),
  293:     %% ack request after initial presence
  294:     maybe_assert_ack_request(1, N, Alice),
  295:     StanzasRec = maybe_discard_vcard_update(1, N, Alice),
  296:     ct:print("discarded"),
  297:     escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, <<"Hi, Alice!">>)),
  298:     escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [<<"Hi, Alice!">>],
  299:                    escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice)),
  300:     maybe_assert_ack_request(StanzasRec + 1, N, Alice).
  301: 
  302: maybe_assert_ack_request(StanzasRec, AckRequests, Alice) ->
  303:     ct:print("StanzasRec: ~p, AckRequests: ~p", [StanzasRec, AckRequests]),
  304:     case StanzasRec rem AckRequests of
  305:         0 ->
  306:             escalus:assert(is_sm_ack_request, escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice));
  307:         _ ->
  308:             ok
  309:     end,
  310:     StanzasRec.
  311: 
  312: maybe_discard_vcard_update(StanzasRec, AckFreq, Alice) ->
  313:     case discard_vcard_update(Alice) of
  314:         0 ->
  315:             StanzasRec;
  316:         1 ->
  317:             maybe_assert_ack_request(StanzasRec + 1, AckFreq, Alice)
  318:     end.
  319: 
  320: server_requests_ack_freq_2(Config) ->
  321:     Config1 = escalus_users:update_userspec(Config, alice, manual_ack, true),
  322:     server_requests_ack(Config1, 2).
  323: 
  324: server_requests_ack_after_session(Config) ->
  325:     AliceSpec = given_fresh_spec(Config, alice),
  326:     {ok, Alice, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec,
  327:                                                  [start_stream,
  328:                                                   stream_features,
  329:                                                   maybe_use_ssl,
  330:                                                   authenticate,
  331:                                                   bind,
  332:                                                   stream_management,
  333:                                                   session
  334:                                                  ]),
  335:     escalus:assert(is_sm_ack_request, escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, stream_mgmt_req)).
  336: 
  337: 
  338: resend_more_offline_messages_than_buffer_size(Config) ->
  339:     ConnSteps =  [start_stream,
  340:                   stream_features,
  341:                   authenticate,
  342:                   bind,
  343:                   session],
  344: 
  345:     %% connect bob and alice
  346:     BobSpec = given_fresh_spec(Config, bob),
  347:     {ok, Bob, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(BobSpec),
  348:     escalus_connection:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  349:     escalus_connection:get_stanza(Bob, presence),
  350:     AliceSpec = given_fresh_spec(Config, alice),
  351: 
  352:     % sent some messages - more than unacked buffer size
  353:     MessagesToSend = ?SMALL_SM_BUFFER + 1,
  354:     JID = get_bjid(AliceSpec),
  355:     [escalus_connection:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(JID, integer_to_binary(I)))
  356:      || I <- lists:seq(1, MessagesToSend)],
  357: 
  358:     % connect alice who wants to receive all messages from offline storage
  359:     {ok, Alice, _Props, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec, ConnSteps++[stream_management]),
  360:     escalus_connection:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  361: 
  362:     escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, MessagesToSend * 2), %messages and ack requests
  363: 
  364:     escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, presence),
  365:     escalus:wait_for_stanza(Alice), % ack request
  366: 
  367:     % confirm messages + presence
  368:     escalus_connection:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:sm_ack(4)),
  369:     % wait for check constraint message on server side
  370:     ct:sleep(?CONSTRAINT_CHECK_TIMEOUT+1000),
  371: 
  372:     % should not receive anything especially any stream errors
  373:     false = escalus_client:has_stanzas(Alice),
  374: 
  375:     escalus_connection:stop(Alice),
  376:     escalus_connection:stop(Bob).
  377: 
  378: resend_unacked_on_reconnection(Config) ->
  379:     Messages = [<<"msg-1">>, <<"msg-2">>, <<"msg-3">>],
  380:     {Bob, _} = given_fresh_user(Config, bob),
  381:     {Alice, AliceSpec0} = given_fresh_user(Config, alice),
  382:         discard_vcard_update(Alice),
  383:         %% Bob sends some messages to Alice.
  384:         [escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(Alice, Msg))
  385:          || Msg <- Messages],
  386:         %% Alice receives the messages.
  387:         Stanzas = escalus:wait_for_stanzas(Alice, length(Messages)),
  388:         [escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [Msg], Stanza)
  389:          || {Msg, Stanza} <- lists:zip(Messages, Stanzas)],
  390:         %% Alice disconnects without acking the messages.
  391:     escalus_connection:stop(Alice),
  392:     escalus_connection:stop(Bob),
  393:     %% Messages go to the offline store.
  394:     %% Alice receives the messages from the offline store.
  395:     AliceSpec = [{manual_ack, true} | AliceSpec0],
  396:     {ok, NewAlice, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec),
  397:     escalus_connection:send(NewAlice, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  398:     OfflineMsgs = [escalus_connection:get_stanza(NewAlice, {msg, I})
  399:                    || I <- lists:seq(1, length(Messages))],
  400:     [escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [Msg], Stanza)
  401:      || {Msg, Stanza} <- lists:zip(Messages, OfflineMsgs)],
  402:     %% Alice acks the delayed messages so they won't go again
  403:     %% to the offline store.
  404:     escalus_connection:send(NewAlice, escalus_stanza:sm_ack(3)).
  405: 
  406: preserve_order(Config) ->
  407:     ConnSteps =  [start_stream,
  408:                   stream_features,
  409:                   authenticate,
  410:                   bind,
  411:                   session],
  412: 
  413:     %% connect bob and alice
  414:     BobSpec = given_fresh_spec(Config, bob),
  415:     {ok, Bob, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(BobSpec),
  416:     escalus_connection:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  417:     escalus_connection:get_stanza(Bob, presence),
  418: 
  419:     AliceSpec = given_fresh_spec(Config, alice),
  420:     {ok, Alice, _Props, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec, ConnSteps++[stream_resumption]),
  421:     escalus_connection:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  422:     escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, presence),
  423: 
  424:     escalus:assert(is_sm_ack_request, escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, ack)),
  425:     escalus_connection:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(get_bjid(AliceSpec), <<"1">>)),
  426: 
  427:     %% kill alice connection
  428:     kill_connection(Alice),
  429:     %ct:sleep(300),
  430:     escalus_connection:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(get_bjid(AliceSpec), <<"2">>)),
  431:     escalus_connection:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(get_bjid(AliceSpec), <<"3">>)),
  432: 
  433:     {ok, NewAlice, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec, ConnSteps),
  434:     escalus_connection:send(NewAlice, escalus_stanza:enable_sm([resume])),
  435: 
  436:     escalus_connection:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(get_bjid(AliceSpec), <<"4">>)),
  437:     escalus_connection:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(get_bjid(AliceSpec), <<"5">>)),
  438: 
  439:     escalus_connection:send(NewAlice, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  440:     escalus_connection:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(get_bjid(AliceSpec), <<"6">>)),
  441: 
  442:     receive_all_ordered(NewAlice,1),
  443: 
  444:     % replace connection
  445:     {ok, NewAlice2, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec, ConnSteps),
  446:     % allow messages to go to the offline storage
  447:     ct:sleep(1000),
  448: 
  449:     escalus_connection:send(NewAlice2, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  450: 
  451:     % receves messages in correct order
  452:     receive_all_ordered(NewAlice2, 1),
  453: 
  454:     escalus_connection:stop(Bob),
  455:     escalus_connection:stop(NewAlice2).
  456: 
  457: receive_all_ordered(Conn, N) ->
  458:     case catch escalus_connection:get_stanza(Conn, msg) of
  459:         #xmlel{} = Stanza ->
  460: 	    NN = case Stanza#xmlel.name of
  461:         <<"message">> ->
  462: %% 		    ct:pal("~p~n", [Stanza]),
  463:             escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [list_to_binary(integer_to_list(N))], Stanza),
  464:             N+1;
  465: 		_ ->
  466: 		    N
  467: 	    end,
  468:             receive_all_ordered(Conn, NN);
  469:         _Error ->
  470:             ok
  471:     end.
  472: 
  473: resend_unacked_after_resume_timeout(Config) ->
  474:     ConnSteps =  [start_stream,
  475:                   stream_features,
  476:                   authenticate,
  477:                   bind,
  478:                   session],
  479: 
  480:     %% connect bob and alice
  481:     BobSpec = given_fresh_spec(Config, bob),
  482:     {ok, Bob, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(BobSpec),
  483:     escalus_connection:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  484:     escalus_connection:get_stanza(Bob, presence),
  485: 
  486:     AliceSpec = given_fresh_spec(Config, alice),
  487:     {ok, Alice, _Props, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec, ConnSteps++[stream_resumption]),
  488:     escalus_connection:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  489:     escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, presence),
  490: 
  491:     escalus:assert(is_sm_ack_request, escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, ack)),
  492: 
  493:     escalus_connection:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(get_bjid(AliceSpec), <<"msg-1">>)),
  494:     %% kill alice connection
  495:     kill_connection(Alice),
  496:     U = proplists:get_value(username, AliceSpec),
  497:     S = proplists:get_value(server, AliceSpec),
  498:     1 = length(escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_sm, get_user_resources, [U, S])),
  499:     %% wait 2 times longer to be sure that c2s is dead
  500:     ct:sleep({seconds, 2 * ?SHORT_RESUME_TIMEOUT}),
  501:     %% ensure there is no session
  502:     0 = length(escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_sm, get_user_resources, [U, S])),
  503: 
  504:     %% alice come back and receives unacked message
  505:     {ok, NewAlice, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec, ConnSteps),
  506:     escalus_connection:send(NewAlice, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  507: 
  508:     Stanzas =[escalus_connection:get_stanza(NewAlice, msg),
  509:               escalus_connection:get_stanza(NewAlice, msg)],
  510: 
  511:     escalus_new_assert:mix_match([is_presence,
  512:                                   is_chat(<<"msg-1">>)],
  513:                                  Stanzas),
  514: 
  515:     escalus_connection:stop(Bob),
  516:     escalus_connection:stop(Alice).
  517: 
  518: resume_session_state_send_message(Config) ->
  519:     ConnSteps =  [
  520:                   start_stream,
  521:                   stream_features,
  522:                   authenticate,
  523:                   bind,
  524:                   session],
  525: 
  526:     %% connect bob and alice
  527: 
  528:     BobSpec = given_fresh_spec(Config, bob),
  529:     {ok, Bob, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(BobSpec),
  530:     escalus_connection:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  531:     escalus_connection:get_stanza(Bob, presence),
  532: 
  533:     AliceSpec = given_fresh_spec(Config, alice),
  534:     {ok, Alice, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec, ConnSteps++[stream_resumption]),
  535:     escalus_connection:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  536:     escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, presence),
  537: 
  538:     escalus:assert(is_sm_ack_request, escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, ack)),
  539: 
  540:     escalus_connection:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(get_bjid(AliceSpec), <<"msg-1">>)),
  541:     %% kill alice connection
  542:     kill_connection(Alice),
  543:     ct:sleep(1000), %% alice should be in resume_session_state
  544: 
  545:     U = proplists:get_value(username, AliceSpec),
  546:     S = proplists:get_value(server, AliceSpec),
  547:     1 = length(escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_sm, get_user_resources, [U, S])),
  548: 
  549:     %% send some messages and check if c2s can handle it
  550:     escalus_connection:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(get_bjid(AliceSpec), <<"msg-2">>)),
  551:     escalus_connection:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(get_bjid(AliceSpec), <<"msg-3">>)),
  552: 
  553:     %% alice comes back and receives unacked message
  554:     {ok, NewAlice, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec, ConnSteps),
  555:     escalus_connection:send(NewAlice, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  556: 
  557:     Stanzas = [escalus_connection:get_stanza(NewAlice, msg) || _ <- lists:seq(1,4) ],
  558: 
  559:     % what about order ?
  560:     escalus_new_assert:mix_match([is_presence,
  561:                                   is_chat(<<"msg-1">>),
  562:                                   is_chat(<<"msg-2">>),
  563:                                   is_chat(<<"msg-3">>)],
  564:                                  Stanzas),
  565:     escalus_connection:stop(Bob),
  566:     escalus_connection:stop(NewAlice).
  567: 
  568: %%for instance it can be done by mod ping
  569: resume_session_state_stop_c2s(Config) ->
  570:     ConnSteps =  [start_stream,
  571:                   stream_features,
  572:                   authenticate,
  573:                   bind,
  574:                   session],
  575: 
  576:     %% connect bob and alice
  577:     BobSpec = given_fresh_spec(Config, bob),
  578:     {ok, Bob, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(BobSpec, ConnSteps),
  579:     escalus_connection:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  580:     escalus_connection:get_stanza(Bob, presence),
  581: 
  582:     AliceSpec = given_fresh_spec(Config, alice),
  583:     {ok, Alice, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec, ConnSteps++[stream_resumption]),
  584:     escalus_connection:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  585:     escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, presence),
  586: 
  587:     escalus:assert(is_sm_ack_request, escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, ack)),
  588:     escalus_connection:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(get_bjid(AliceSpec), <<"msg-1">>)),
  589: 
  590:     % kill alice connection
  591:     kill_connection(Alice),
  592:     ct:sleep(1000), %% alice should be in resume_session_state
  593:     % session should be  alive
  594:     U = proplists:get_value(username, AliceSpec),
  595:     S = proplists:get_value(server, AliceSpec),
  596:     [Res] = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_sm, get_user_resources, [U, S]),
  597:     %% get pid of c2s and stop him !
  598:     C2SRef = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_sm, get_session_pid, [U, S, Res]),
  599:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_c2s, stop, [C2SRef] ),
  600:     ct:sleep(1000), %% c2s should be in resume_session_state
  601: 
  602:     %% alice comes back and receives unacked message
  603:     {ok, NewAlice, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec, ConnSteps),
  604:     escalus_connection:send(NewAlice, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  605: 
  606:     Stanzas = [escalus_connection:get_stanza(NewAlice, msg),
  607:                escalus_connection:get_stanza(NewAlice, msg)],
  608: 
  609:     escalus_new_assert:mix_match([is_presence,
  610:                                   is_chat(<<"msg-1">>)],
  611:                                  Stanzas),
  612: 
  613:     escalus_connection:stop(NewAlice),
  614:     escalus_connection:stop(Bob).
  615: 
  616: %% This test only verifies the validity of helpers (get_session_pid,
  617: %% assert_no_offline_msgs, assert_c2s_state) written for wait_for_resumption
  618: %% testcase.
  619: session_established(Config) ->
  620:     AliceSpec = [{manual_ack, true}
  621:                  | given_fresh_spec(Config, alice)],
  622:     {Alice, _} = given_fresh_user_with_spec(AliceSpec),
  623:     {ok, C2SPid} = get_session_pid(AliceSpec, server_string("escalus-default-resource")),
  624:     assert_no_offline_msgs(AliceSpec),
  625:     assert_c2s_state(C2SPid, session_established),
  626:     escalus_connection:stop(Alice).
  627: 
  628: %% Ensure that after a violent disconnection,
  629: %% the c2s waits for resumption (but don't resume yet).
  630: wait_for_resumption(Config) ->
  631:     AliceSpec = [{manual_ack, true}
  632:                  | given_fresh_spec(Config, alice)],
  633:     {Bob, _} = given_fresh_user(Config, bob),
  634:     Messages = [<<"msg-1">>, <<"msg-2">>, <<"msg-3">>],
  635:     {C2SPid, _} = buffer_unacked_messages_and_die(AliceSpec, Bob, Messages),
  636:     %% Ensure the c2s process is waiting for resumption.
  637:     assert_no_offline_msgs(AliceSpec),
  638:     assert_c2s_state(C2SPid, resume_session).
  639: 
  640: resume_session(Config) ->
  641:     AliceSpec = [{manual_ack, true}
  642:                  | given_fresh_spec(Config, alice)],
  643:     Messages = [<<"msg-1">>, <<"msg-2">>, <<"msg-3">>],
  644:     escalus:fresh_story(Config, [{bob, 1}], fun(Bob) ->
  645:         {_, SMID} = buffer_unacked_messages_and_die(AliceSpec, Bob, Messages),
  646:         %% Resume the session.
  647:         Steps = [start_stream,
  648:                  stream_features,
  649:                  maybe_use_ssl,
  650:                  authenticate,
  651:                  mk_resume_stream(SMID, 2)],
  652:         {ok, Alice, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec, Steps),
  653:         NDiscarded = discard_vcard_update(Alice),
  654:         %% Alice receives the unacked messages from the previous
  655:         %% interrupted session.
  656:         Stanzas = [escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, {msg, I})
  657:                    || I <- lists:seq(1, 3)],
  658:         [escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [Msg], Stanza)
  659:          || {Msg, Stanza} <- lists:zip(Messages, Stanzas)],
  660:         %% Alice acks the received messages.
  661:         escalus_connection:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:sm_ack(5 + NDiscarded)),
  662:         escalus_connection:stop(Alice)
  663:     end).
  664: 
  665: mk_resume_stream(SMID, PrevH) ->
  666:     fun (Conn, Props, Features) ->
  667:             escalus_connection:send(Conn, escalus_stanza:resume(SMID, PrevH)),
  668:             Resumed = escalus_connection:get_stanza(Conn, get_resumed),
  669:             true = escalus_pred:is_sm_resumed(SMID, Resumed),
  670:             {Conn, [{smid, SMID} | Props], Features}
  671:     end.
  672: 
  673: buffer_unacked_messages_and_die(AliceSpec, Bob, Messages) ->
  674:     Steps = [start_stream,
  675:              stream_features,
  676:              maybe_use_ssl,
  677:              authenticate,
  678:              bind,
  679:              session,
  680:              stream_resumption],
  681:     {ok, Alice, Props, _} = escalus_connection:start(AliceSpec, Steps),
  682:     JID = get_bjid(Props),
  683:     InitialPresence = setattr(escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>),
  684:                               <<"id">>, <<"presence1">>),
  685:     escalus_connection:send(Alice, InitialPresence),
  686:     Presence = escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, presence1),
  687:     escalus:assert(is_presence, Presence),
  688:     Res = server_string("escalus-default-resource"),
  689:     {ok, C2SPid} = get_session_pid(AliceSpec, Res),
  690:     escalus_connection:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  691:     _Presence = escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, presence2),
  692:     discard_vcard_update(Alice),
  693:     %% Bobs sends some messages to Alice.
  694:     [escalus:send(Bob, escalus_stanza:chat_to(JID, Msg))
  695:      || Msg <- Messages],
  696:     %% Alice receives them, but doesn't ack.
  697:     Stanzas = [escalus_connection:get_stanza(Alice, {msg, I})
  698:                || I <- lists:seq(1, 3)],
  699:     [escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [Msg], Stanza)
  700:      || {Msg, Stanza} <- lists:zip(Messages, Stanzas)],
  701:     %% Alice's connection is violently terminated.
  702:     kill_connection(Alice),
  703:     {C2SPid, proplists:get_value(smid, Props)}.
  704: 
  705: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  706: %% Helpers
  707: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  708: 
  709: discard_offline_messages(Config, UserName) ->
  710:     discard_offline_messages(Config, UserName, 1).
  711: 
  712: discard_offline_messages(Config, UserName, H) when is_atom(UserName) ->
  713:     Spec = escalus_users:get_options(Config, UserName),
  714:     {ok, User, _, _} = escalus_connection:start(Spec),
  715:     escalus_connection:send(User, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  716:     discard_offline_messages(Config, User, H);
  717: discard_offline_messages(Config, User, H) ->
  718:     Stanza = escalus_connection:get_stanza(User, maybe_offline_msg),
  719:     escalus_connection:send(User, escalus_stanza:sm_ack(H)),
  720:     case escalus_pred:is_presence(Stanza) of
  721:         true ->
  722:             ok;
  723:         false ->
  724:             discard_offline_messages(Config, User, H+1)
  725:     end.
  726: 
  727: buffer_max(BufferMax) ->
  728:     {buffer_max,
  729:      fun () ->
  730:              escalus_ejabberd:rpc(?MOD_SM, get_buffer_max, [unset])
  731:      end,
  732:      fun (unset) ->
  733:              ct:pal("buffer_max was not set - setting to 'undefined'"),
  734:              escalus_ejabberd:rpc(?MOD_SM, set_buffer_max, [undefined]);
  735:          (V) ->
  736:              escalus_ejabberd:rpc(?MOD_SM, set_buffer_max, [V])
  737:      end,
  738:      BufferMax}.
  739: 
  740: ack_freq(AckFreq) ->
  741:     {ack_freq,
  742:      fun () ->
  743:              escalus_ejabberd:rpc(?MOD_SM, get_ack_freq, [unset])
  744:      end,
  745:      fun (unset) ->
  746:              ct:pal("ack_freq was not set - setting to 'undefined'"),
  747:              escalus_ejabberd:rpc(?MOD_SM, set_ack_freq, [undefined]);
  748:          (V) ->
  749:              escalus_ejabberd:rpc(?MOD_SM, set_ack_freq, [V])
  750:      end,
  751:      AckFreq}.
  752: 
  753: assert_no_offline_msgs(Spec) ->
  754:     Username = escalus_utils:jid_to_lower(proplists:get_value(username, Spec)),
  755:     Server = proplists:get_value(server, Spec),
  756:     0 = mongoose_helper:total_offline_messages({Username, Server}).
  757: 
  758: assert_no_offline_msgs() ->
  759:     0 = mongoose_helper:total_offline_messages().
  760: 
  761: 
  762: 
  763: assert_c2s_state(C2SPid, StateName) when is_pid(C2SPid) ->
  764:     SysStatus = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(sys, get_status, [C2SPid]),
  765:     StateName = extract_state_name(SysStatus).
  766: 
  767: extract_state_name(SysStatus) ->
  768:     {status, _Pid, {module, _},
  769:      [_, _, _, _, [_, {data, FSMData} | _]]} = SysStatus,
  770:     proplists:get_value("StateName", FSMData).
  771: 
  772: get_session_pid(UserSpec, Resource) ->
  773:     ConfigUS = [proplists:get_value(username, UserSpec),
  774:                 proplists:get_value(server, UserSpec)],
  775:     [U, S] = [server_string(V) || V <- ConfigUS],
  776:     case escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_sm, get_session_pid, [U, S, server_string(Resource)]) of
  777:         none ->
  778:             {error, no_found};
  779:         C2SPid ->
  780:             {ok, C2SPid}
  781:     end.
  782: 
  783: clear_session_table() ->
  784:     Node = escalus_ct:get_config(ejabberd_node),
  785:     SessionBackend  = escalus_ejabberd:rpc(ejabberd_sm_backend, backend, []),
  786:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(SessionBackend, cleanup, [Node]).
  787: 
  788: clear_sm_session_table() ->
  789:     escalus_ejabberd:rpc(mnesia, clear_table, [sm_session]).
  790: 
  791: kill_connection(#client{module = escalus_tcp, ssl = SSL,
  792:                            socket = Socket} = Conn) ->
  793:     %% Ugly, but there's no API for killing the connection
  794:     %% without sending </stream:stream>.
  795:     case SSL of
  796:         true ->
  797:             ssl:close(Socket);
  798:         false ->
  799:             gen_tcp:close(Socket)
  800:     end,
  801:     %% There might be open zlib streams left...
  802:     catch escalus_connection:stop(Conn).
  803: 
  804: is_chat(Content) ->
  805:     fun(Stanza) -> escalus_pred:is_chat_message(Content, Stanza) end.
  806: 
  807: get_bjid(UserSpec) ->
  808:     User = proplists:get_value(username, UserSpec),
  809:     Server = proplists:get_value(server, UserSpec),
  810:     <<User/binary,"@",Server/binary>>.
  811: 
  812: given_fresh_spec(Config, User) ->
  813:     NewConfig = escalus_fresh:create_users(Config, [{User, 1}]),
  814:     escalus_users:get_userspec(NewConfig, User).
  815: 
  816: given_fresh_user(Config, UserName) ->
  817:     Spec = given_fresh_spec(Config, UserName),
  818:     given_fresh_user_with_spec(Spec).
  819: 
  820: given_fresh_user_with_spec(Spec) ->
  821:     {ok, User, Props, _} = escalus_connection:start(Spec),
  822:     escalus:send(User, escalus_stanza:presence(<<"available">>)),
  823:     escalus:wait_for_stanza(User),
  824:     JID = get_bjid(Props),
  825:     {User#client{jid  = JID}, Spec}.
  826:
